snippet: President Obama has decided to meet his G-8 counterparts nearby at Camp David, though a NATO meeting will still be held in Chicago.
abstract: Pres Obama decides to meet his G-8 counterparts at Camp David, the presidential retreat in Maryland, though a NATO meeting will still be held in Chicago.
lead_paragraph: President Obama has decided to meet his G-8 counterparts nearby at Camp David, though a NATO meeting will still be held in Chicago.

headline.main: Camp David, Not Chicago, to Host G-8
headline.print_headline: Camp David, Not Chicago, To Host G-8
